original_title: UNDP envoy in Sri Lanka meets with President Ranil
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe met with UNDP’s Resident Representative in Sri Lanka, Azusa Kubota on Friday (June 16).

During the discussion, the Head of State has indicated his government’s willingness to engage the United Nations Development Program (UNDP) on capacity building of the Parliamentary Oversight Committees and youth engagement in public policy.
